frontmatter.description: Resume using Google's Material Design visual language. Built using modern web development workflow tools, such as Bower for package mamagement, Gulp and plugins for web development task management, Jade as HTML template language and Materialize SASS as CSS scaffolding.

biography.label: Summary
biography.p1: I am a proud tinkerer, inventor, nerd, student, and full-time software developer. From prosthetic arms to educational learning platforms, to drones, it has been my goal to be a part of the future and make something that would change the world amazing. Learning is important to me, causing me to regularly put myself through circumstances that pushes the boundaries of my knowledge.

items.description: Directed team of interaction and visual designers to create responsive solution to monitor human violations in real-time, minimizing bankâ€™s regulatory risk to zero
Streamlined UX budget from $4.4M/yr to 1.75M/yr (-60.3%) while establishing a lean cross-functional design and front-end development capable of delivering effectively in an Agile environment

Lead product design strategy effort for an Investment Management segment, collaborating with over 10 stakeholders to brainstorm and prioritize features, define navigation patterns, and propose user interface design guidelines and framework

Improved website (lincolncenter.org) user interaction and usability, allowing better customer communication and marketing in online and offline channels, and increase online ticket sales, subscriptions, and other revenue sources
items.project: Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, as Consultant

items.description: Led team to developed interaction strategies, interaction design, prototyping, and visual design for a multidimensional site - Geography, Language and Partner
Architected, designed, and developed a front-end solution delivering thousands of co-branded web- sites and on-demand factsheet PDFs

timeline.label: Professional Experience
timeline.p1: User experience designer capable of establishing a creative environment for team members to show their talents, complement each other, and strive to achieve the right design solution with measurable results and accountability. A thorough understanding of contemporary methodologies, and a confident influence for small to medium sized teams to thrive in a fast paced, challenging environment while creating thoughtful, innovative good business solutions for the end user.
